name: Sun of Steel
description:
Context

Sun of Steel is a 3 months student project for the french college: IIM - Digital School Paris

It is a cooperative 3D first person shoot'em up in a post-apocaliptic world

Gameplay

In this post-apocaliptic world. You play the members of a group that controls a vehicle. Each member has an important role to play as a driver or as a shooter against the enemies who will attack you.

Controls

ZQSD : Move 

Space : Jump

E : Interact

Left Click : Shoot

Echap: Pause
